casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Curtis L. TYSON 198P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Curtis L. Tyson, for Tyson, Curtis L. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

*582The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2018 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
